code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../ProjectsNavigation/MediaQueries.css";import{useEffect}from"react";import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectsNavigation=()=>{const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const currentPath=window.location.pathname;if(currentPath==="/"){setSelectedOption(1);}else if(currentPath==="/uxProjects"){setSelectedOption(2);}else if(currentPath==="/frontendProjects"){setSelectedOption(3);}},[]);const handleOptionClick=option=>{setSelectedOption(option===selectedOption?null:option);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigationContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"no-underline ".concat(selectedOption===1?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick('Todos'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Todos"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/uxProjects",className:"no-underline ".concat(selectedOption===2?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick('User Experience'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"User Experience"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/frontendProjects",className:"no-underline ".concat(selectedOption===3?'selected':''),onClick:()=>handleOptionClick('Front-End'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Front-End"})})})]})});};export default ProjectsNavigation;
